Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy

Automatic Trading Strategies
Author:
pschatzmann
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ITradeEvent  
    ITradingStrategy  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuyAndHoldStrategy
    We buy the title when the account is opened and hold the stock.
    BuyOnUpAfterDown
    We buy after a stock was falling for n periods and we sell when the stock falls below the bought price again or after we have a profit for n%
    CCICorrectionStrategy
    CCI Correction Strategy
    CommonTradingStrategy
    Common functionality for trading strategies.
    GlobalExtremaStrategy
    Strategies which compares current price to global extrema over a week.
    MovingMomentumStrategy
    Moving momentum strategy.
    NamedStrategy
    eu.verdelhan.ta4j.Strategy which provides name
    OptimizedStrategy
    Performs an optimization for the indicated period.
    RSI2Strategy
    2-Period RSI Strategy see http://stockcharts.com/school/doku.php?id=chart_school:trading_strategies:rsi2
    SciptStrategy
    Strategies implemented by a scripting language.
    TradingStrategyFactory
    Factory which lists and creates the available trading strategies
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OptimizedStrategy.Schedule  
    TradingStrategyFactory.StrategyEnum
